projects.name: Retornável
projects.description:
A sloppy teenager is forced to tidy up his room. However, when he chooses to do everything the easy way, he discovers that the problem doesn't end when he puts the trash in the garbage can.

This project was one of the winners of the 'Curta animação 2013: Resíduos sólidos em um minuto' (Short animation 2013: Solid waste in a minute) and was produced with funds from MINC/SAV.


This project received the following awards:
  •  Anima Multi/Animmundi 2015 (Audience Awards)
  •  Green Nation 2016 (Audience Awards)
  •  Green Nation 2016 (Juri Awards)

projects.name: O Código de Camões
projects.description:
A headless statement by a teacher in East Timor who soon after disappears. A mysterious letter left by the poet Luís de Camões that reveals the existence of a valuable treasure hidden in Brazil. A secret code to be deciphered in the verses of The Lusiads. An object that would have magical powers, called portulabio. And a group of teenagers, The Natos, of which the reader is invited to be part. These are the ingredients for an incredible adventure through the Portuguese-speaking countries aboard the Icaro, a solar-powered seaplane. In a dispute against the ambitious businessman Jack Stress, Os Natos will do everything to prove that the Portuguese language is still alive in the four corners of the world. In this mystery-filled adventure, the reader interacts with the book to decipher the clues.

Autor: Beto Junqueira

Editora: Estrela Cultural

projects.name: Deu a louca no mundo
projects.description:
A series of attacks around the world leaves humanity in panic. The authorities take action, but in the midst of this climate of uncertainty and distrust, Helô, a member of the special mission group the Natos, disappears. Mano-Loco, with his crazy gas, goes into action and goes on a rampage around the world, driving the big celebrities crazy. Who is behind these attacks? Could The Natos stand up to so many powerful people? In this story of adventure and suspense, the reader will plunge into the world of vanity, where what counts is appearance.

Autor: Beto Junqueira

Editora: Estrela Cultural
